page.title: 19Children's Games and Crazes
page.content: There are lots of different games played in this area. They include football,cricket,tennis,rounders, netball,snooker,darts and conkers. Conkers is a game for two people who each have a horse chestnut on a string. One person holds his/her conker up and the other tries to hit it by swinging their own at it. If you break the other conker then yours becomes a '1-er'.It is usually played in late September/early October when the chestnuts are being blown off the trees by the autumn gales. A popular craze, at the moment,is BMX bicycle racing. This is carried out on special bikes designed for cross-country and stunt riding. Special clothes are used for BMX racing to protect riders from cuts and bruises.They include helmets and pads for elbows and knees.
